duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for web publishing to create and implement online content with related taxonomy components.
Demonstrated understanding of web publishing components, including domain name planning and registration, web hosting, web design and development, promotion, and maintenance.
Extensive background in using Visual Basic Applications, VBA to automate MS Word.
A demonstrated understanding of the relationships between and uses of taxonomies, thesauri, ontologies, metadata management and application, controlled vocabularies, and authority control.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, and facility communicating effectively with remote colleagues.
Expert proofreading, organizational, and research skills.
Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with teammates and self-disciplined when working alone.
Ensure content meets established standards of accuracy, quality, time, and usability.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's with 5 - 8 years (or commensurate experience), Able to obtain a Public Trust
